the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Denver Nuggets 108-97 Tuesday night in Allen Iverson 's first game against his former team. It was weird to see him wearing a white jersey and we're wearing black,'' Kyle Korver said. I said to one of our coaches that it is so weird to see him on the other side. It wasn't really a good feeling at all. He's a great player and he meant a lot to Philadelphia. Allen Iverson scored 30 points on 10-of-24 shooting before getting tossed for his second technical with 1:44 remaining. To win this game was big for us http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series.`` He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston.`` Anytime a guy like that is on fire,
